ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark Expansion
ygData.msgSnippet: nah, that s optimistic.  Naive is a Red Sox fan who doubts the Curse of the Bambino and still thinks they can win the World Series. Kit From: Daniel P.
ygData.messageBody:
nah, that's optimistic. Naive is a Red Sox fan who doubts the "Curse of the
Bambino" and still thinks they can win the World Series.

Kit

From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>

Harmonic - I have a hard time disagreeing with anything you've posted here.
I do remain hopeful that you're wrong; and the expansion will come out and
we'll have a bunch of cool new songs; that they for the most part work. I
also hope that they fix Lullaby - and get the other missing songs (that they
said would be out with the expansion)

Naive? Well, I'm a lifelong Cubs fan (and two-time season ticket holder)
who also hopes to see my beloved team win the World Series.

Slyde Katzenjammer
still 36 on Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: "Ryan Honeyman" <honeyman@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2000 3:09 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark Expansion


> 95% of what is listed in that file is live and in the game. To suggest
> that half of it won't make it to final is pure speculation on your part.
> And that's what this all boils down to. Everyone's best guess.
>
> If those spells made it into the file this far, chances are they are
> going into the game. Allbeit, their values/stats/effects may be tweaked
> you can count on those spells going live. Such is my experience since
> early beta. (And I don't mean the bogus InstantKill spell at the end
> of the file)
>
<snip>
